All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    cont_function
    The interface represents a continuance function
    Ex0  
    function
    This interface represents a simple function of type y=f(x), where both y and x are real numbers.
    Monom
    This class represents a simple "Monom" of shape a*x^b, where a is a real number and a is an integer (summed a none negative), see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monomial The class implements function and support simple operations as: construction, value at x, derivative, add and multiply.
    Monom_Comperator  
    MonomTest
    This class represents a simple (naive) tester for the Monom class, Note:
    (i) The class is NOT a JUNIT - (i.e., educational reasons) - should be changed to a proper JUnit in Ex1.
    Polynom
    This class represents a Polynom with add, multiply functionality, it also should support the following: 1.
    Polynom_able
    This interface represents a general Polynom: f(x) = a_1X^b_1 + a_2*X^b_2 ... a_n*Xb_n, where: a_1, a_2 ... a_n are real numbers and b_1
    PolynomTest
